quiz.question: Qual a forma correta para 'Há um carro na rua'?
options: There is a car on the street
There are a car on the street
There be a car on the street
quiz.answer: There is a car on the street

quiz.question: Complete: '___ five people in the room.'
Qual a forma negativa de 'There is a cat here'?
Traduza: 'Há muitos livros na estante.'
options: There are many books on the shelf
There is many books on the shelf
There be many books on the shelf
quiz.answer: There are many books on the shelf

quiz.question: Como perguntar: 'Existe um restaurante aqui perto?'
Complete: '___ a problem with my computer.'
Traduza: 'Não há pessoas na casa.'
options: There aren’t people in the house
There not people in the house
There isn’t people in the house
quiz.answer: There aren’t people in the house

quiz.question: Como se diz: 'Há uma cadeira aqui'?
